title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 18.5 - Interest eligibility
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 18.5 - Interest eligibility

State Regulations

Interest shall be calculated and paid at the daily rate
pursuant to section
18.6
of this Part on all
interest-eligible payments, as determined in accordance with section
18.2
of this Part, when the payment
date is more than 30 calendar days, excluding legal holidays, after the MIR
date. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
18.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
